description: This file implements core functions for the Slap Object Broker component in the SLAP environment, including object creation, removal, initialization, and object enrollment.

classes.name: SLAP_OBJ_BROKER_OBJECT
classes.description: The primary object representing the SLAP Object Broker, containing function pointers and internal state for object management.

classes.name: ANSC_LIGHT_COMPONENT_OBJECT
classes.description: Base class structure for component objects, providing common attributes and functions.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapOboCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Slap Obj Broker Object, setting up its member variables and function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOboRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys a given Slap Obj Broker Object, freeing associated resources and memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOboEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all necessary subordinate objects into the broker, preparing it for operation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOboInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the member variables and function pointers of the broker object, setting up its internal state.
